thread.title: Darla Concienne
thread.title_full: Frames Direct reviewed by Darla Concienne

author: Darla Concienne
title: Darla Concienne
text: This was my first time ordering glasses online, and Framesdirect.com made it such an easy and confidence building experience. I found frames I liked at a reasonable price, order them, and then later that evening got a call from a customer service rep explaining how to determine my PD and where to send a copy of my prescription. I was able to fill out the out-of-network forms online and be reimbursed for half of my glasses from my vision insurance company, which I was not expected. I love the selection of frames they have and how easy the ordering process is. I have already recommended them to several people.
